item.title: How Diane Keaton’s ‘Annie Hall’ Look Was Integral to Her Art
item.description: Though she downplayed it, her role in creating the outfits of “Annie Hall” made her the author of a fascinating career.

item.title: 16 People Killed in Blast at Tennessee Explosives Plant, Officials Confirm
item.description: Local authorities said on Saturday that they had shifted their focus to searching for remains. The cause of the explosion was unclear.
